name: Mop Boy
description: "Mop Boy” is half action platformer, half sitcom! It's about a kid whose family owns and lives above a pizza restaurant. While the other members of the family have normal restaurant jobs (running deliveries, cooking, taking orders), Mop Boy is left battling the grease lingering from the daily grind.  Upstairs, he unwinds and replenishes lost health through bonding with his family. Theme-wise, our game focuses on the importance of good family relationships and finding healthy ways to cope with stress.
